reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the service from Pioneer Pest Management. I had a spider emergency, and I had a technician at my house within a few business days of reaching out. The technician, Tyler B., was quick, friendly, efficient, and went the extra mile for me at no extra charge.

reviews.author: Brian Anderson
reviews.text: The guy that came to get rid of our problem was very nice! He was quick and got rid of our problem right away! I would totally recommend going here! Amazing service!

reviews.author: Matt Rhine

reviews.author: Vicki T
reviews.text: Tyler has been the best Tech we have ever had! If I could choose my tech each time, I would choose Tyler every time. Super friendly and knowledgeable!

reviews.author: Abigayle Mitschele
reviews.text: Tyler is the absolute best, professional,  on time,  very friendly. My home is pest free, which is very important to me because I'm absolutely terrified of spiders :) thank you for all you do!!

reviews.author: Sharon Scott
reviews.text: I've always had good service from Pioneer Pest Management.  But the guy (Zack) who came up to help me this week was really exceptional.  He went above and beyond to both kill the wasps and to take care that they would never bother us again.  And the job was not easy - it was 15 feet up on a shop roof.  He used three kinds of mesh and sealed things up so nicely, and gave me pictures to show exactly what he did.  The price was right, a fantastic job was done, and Zack was a total pleasure to deal with.  I'll certainly be calling Zack in the future when I need help!

reviews.author: Jay Gilberg
reviews.text: Great job Zach--two birds with one hand! Thank you for your help. Jay

reviews.author: James Wunder
reviews.text: We just had Tyler come by our house for a mouse problem. He was incredibly professional and helpful. He explained everything he found and let us ask all of our questions. He was awesome and we would highly recommend him!! We will be calling him if we have any other critter problems in the future.   -James & Alexis

reviews.author: Vicki Blair
reviews.text: Pioneer Pest Management has taking care of rodent, wasp and ant issues at my house for the past five or so years. Like I've found to be the case with all their technicians, Tyler was friendly, helpful, informative and professional. Thanks so much!

reviews.author: James Mathis
reviews.text: Great service. The serviceman that came out was very knowledgeable and helpful.

reviews.author: Travis Malakowsky

reviews.author: Shelley Voigt
reviews.text: Technician Tyler has done an excellent job eliminating the mice problem I had. They are completely eliminated without toxic chemicals inside my home.

reviews.author: James Troxell
reviews.text: The technician that came was very was very punctual. He was extremely knowledgeable of how our pests worked. He was also extremely knowledgeable of how the company worked and very clearly and simple explained all of the options the company offered for our current pest problem and maintaining pest management in the future if we would like to in the future. Will defiantly recommend them to everyone who needs pest management.

reviews.author: Julia Veach
reviews.text: We called Pioneer Pest Management and I had great experience just making my appointment. They're very informative and know what they're doing. A couple days later we had someone come out to our apartment because we've had swarms of ants all over our apartment. (They have been worse than last year.) So we finally decided store bought traps weren't enough to get rid of them. The employee they sent was friendly and explained everything he was doing. He discussed pricing with us and did great job. I haven't seen a single ant since they sprayed and put traps out. They said its takes about 20 days for the ants to take it back to their nest. So far I've seen no ants. Their service also comes with warranty. I'm so impressed.  Thank you.

reviews.author: Maia L
reviews.text: Tyler was amazing! He was very nice and to the point. Will be using Pioneer as my regular pest company.

reviews.author: stacey o'connell
reviews.text: Zack was great! Explained everything thoroughly and was just a pleasure to have help us!

reviews.author: Jackson Graham
reviews.text: Fabulous service and very professional. The technician was very thorough, answered all my questions, and fixed our mice problem so quickly! Gave me peace of mind after a stressful week of trying to do it on our own first. Wish I’d called them sooner!!

reviews.author: Robin Stuart
reviews.text: Ryan is the most awesome bird whisperer! He convinced the pesky bird family to relocate from our attic ducting and put up bird guards so they can't move back in! He was fast, knowledgeable and super friendly! I highly recommend him and Pioneer Pest services for any of your bird wrangling needs! Thanks Ryan and Pioneer Pest Services😊We wil use you in the future if the need ever arises!

reviews.author: Carole Collett-Wheeler
reviews.text: I called Pioneer Pest Management when I realized the  tiny ants I was seeing periodically- and I thought had dealt with we’re back again. My neighbor had used Pioneer and highly recommended them. When Eric and Zack came out , I was sure there wouldn’t be an ant in sight. I couldn’t have been more wrong! Eric and Zack had a flashlight and revealed an unbelievable number of ants heading towards the cat food and in the cat food. Long story short, they quickly analyzed where the ants were living and took care of my house. They took the time to explain what they were doing and what to expect going forward. They answered all my questions- I had a lot- and couldn’t have been nicer or more professional. I highly recommend Eric and Zack to anyone who has unwanted pests. They’re so great!

reviews.author: Yelena Demyanyuk
reviews.text: Called for pest control insection which was promptly scheduled at my convenience. Polite staff arrived on time, they wore  shoe covers everytime they had to go inside. Did very through inspection and the initial treatment.  Thus far I am very pleased with the quality of customer service and I could not wait to see the result of the treatment for significant ant infestation.

reviews.author: Nicole Russell
reviews.text: Very pleased with Pioneer Pest Management. I appreciate that our technician wasn’t a pushy salesman. He was very prompt, courteous, and knowledgeable.

reviews.author: Danielle Michaud
reviews.text: We are very happy to be partnering with Pioneer Pest Management for monitoring ants and other pests around our home. Our first visit in the fall was with Clint, who was extremely outgoing and friendly, as well as knowledgeable. Our second service more recently was with Tyler, who was also great to work with. He took the extra time to hop on a ladder and check out our external vent filters to ensure that we didn't have birds getting into our attic when I mentioned it might be a concern. Both services were on time (if not early!) and it's been really nice to work with people who have such fun personalities.

reviews.author: Geremy Popp
reviews.text: Pioneer has exceptional customer service. Brandon the tech was hands down the best at what he does and how he treats customers. I would highly recommend Pioneer and Brandon.

I also really appreciate that they had email communication too as I work late and can’t always call during the day.

I had concerns about using the bait boxes and he was very patient and helped me understand so that I was comfortable with our plan and it seems to have worked well. After the first few days we saw no more activity though we left the boxes for longer just to be sure. Tyler was equally as patient and professional on the follow up visits and if we ever have any problems in the future he would certainly be our first call. My husband and I wholeheartedly recommend Pioneer and Tyler.

reviews.text: I tried sprays and baits from the store, but never had as much success as with Pioneer. I found a scavenger occasionally, but otherwise no ants for more than a month. Im learning that to get the most of their service you need to make sure treated areas are accessible, so you may need to move items away from walls.

He put preventative measures in place to keep future birds from nesting in our house. He even cleaned the bird droppings off our siding while he was on the ladder. Hopefully we never have future pest problems, but if we do, we'll definitely call Pioneer for help!

reviews.text: I had a dead animal, (I  thought), under my manufactured home. I made an appointment with them. I can't  remember who I  talked with, she said, (again, I  thought)  next Thursday. Well, Thursday  comes around and I call Pioneer and wonderful Kay answered. I told her that I  was wondering  about what time they be at my place. She told me that I wasn't scheduled till May 2nd which would be another week. I said I was staying at a hotel for the last 3 nights because of the smell. Kay felt bad for me and said she'll  try to see what she could do. She calls back and says they can be there the next day. Ryan comes and does a wonderful job checking out  my place. He was very nice and professional. Sorry I rambled on  but I wanted to show how Pioneer went far and above than most businesses. God bless Pioneer.

Ryan was very informative and very professional. I'd rather let them take care of the problem so I can take care of other property concerns. I highly recommend Pioneer Pest Management.

reviews.text: Tyler came out and gave his professional opinion of our pest problem, that we were unable to get under control on our own. He was on time, friendly, knowledgeable, answered all of my questions, and gave me a few good options for how the rodents can be eliminated and then to keep them away long term. I live out in the country and have pets, and I was very concerned about poisoning my own pets, as well as local wildlife. He had printed info on their bait, and how it could rarely affect non-targeted animals that may eat the poisoned ones. I felt reassured and confident in how they can help! Thank you!!!

reviews.text: Edit:  3-25-19:  I do not recommend this location or place for pest management because they sent a teenager to deal with an ant infestation that was not delt with through 2 previous treatments the problem never went away and now I am being unilaterally charged $150 for a 5-minute ant treatment at my home and the teenager that was here reported to my management company that I had a dog which I don't have and that I was the cause of the problem because I have ants. Thanks Pioneer, but no thanks. Your ant service SUCKS and as long as they are charging $150 for 5 minutes of work with 3 difficult full ant treatments and the ants are worse now than before!  Tim came to my home right on schedule, very nice and was clear about what issues I have and what needs to be done.  I appreciate the fact that he didn't suggest treatments for my home that weren't necessary.  Tim was incredibly professional and helped me to understand what was going on in the home I appreciated his professionalism more than anything, I also felt comfortable with him being in my home in spite of the negative issue of having a pest problem. I would highly recommend Tim in the future.

reviews.text: We have been using Pioneer pest for about 4 years. It all started after we had some trees take out along the house. The tree service noted that there were a lot on ants on one of the trees. I didn't think too much about it until the next morning when I went into the garage and found two walls covered with ants. Not knowing what to do I grabbed the shop vac and and started vacuuming up the ants. I got most of them and in the end we had about 2 1/2 gallons of ants. We had Pioneer come out the next day and they sprayed the garage and the complete perimeter of the house. We have pioneer spay twice and year spring and fall and we are ant free. They are easy to work with and very prompt. We would not use anyone else   Dave Smith

reviews.author: toms48
reviews.text: After getting stung by yellow jackets, I called Pioneer Pest Mgmt to remove their nest.  The lady who answered the phone was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. She scheduled a technician for the same day. Daniel (the tech) spent a full hour removing a very large nest (size of a beach ball) in our junipers.  Problem solved on the same day I called!  After discussing the racoon footprints in our crawl space, Daniel mentioned that they could install special screens (that are racoon proof) from the inside our crawl space to keep all large and small critters out.  We had Daniel come back and install the screens.  Now, we don't have to worry about critters getting in our crawl space.  Overall, we have been highly impressed with the quality of the work completed by Daniel and would definitely recommend Pioneer for any pest problems!

I’m looking forward to planting flowers and mowing the yard now. Thank you Pioneer and thank you Ryan! I appreciate your service. reviews.text: I've always had good service from Pioneer Pest Management.  But the guy (Zack) who came up to help me this week was really exceptional.  He went above and beyond to both kill the wasps and to take care that they would never bother us again.  And the job was not easy - it was 15 feet up on a shop roof.  He used three kinds of mesh and sealed things up so nicely, and gave me pictures to show exactly what he did.  The price was right, a fantastic job was done, and Zack was a total pleasure to deal with.  I'll certainly be calling Zack in the future when I need help!

reviews.author: Jay Gilberg
reviews.text: Great job Zach--two birds with one hand! Thank you for your help. Jay

reviews.author: James Wunder
reviews.text: We just had Tyler come by our house for a mouse problem. He was incredibly professional and helpful. He explained everything he found and let us ask all of our questions. He was awesome and we would highly recommend him!! We will be calling him if we have any other critter problems in the future.   -James & Alexis

reviews.author: Vicki Blair
reviews.text: Pioneer Pest Management has taking care of rodent, wasp and ant issues at my house for the past five or so years. Like I've found to be the case with all their technicians, Tyler was friendly, helpful, informative and professional. Thanks so much!

reviews.author: James Mathis
reviews.text: Great service. The serviceman that came out was very knowledgeable and helpful.

reviews.author: Travis Malakowsky
reviews.text: Can never say enough about the service of this place. Always so nice and helpful! And the ants are gone! Thank you Tyler for coming out with your great attitude, and doing an awesome job!

reviews.author: Shelley Voigt
reviews.text: Technician Tyler has done an excellent job eliminating the mice problem I had. They are completely eliminated without toxic chemicals inside my home.

reviews.author: James Troxell
reviews.text: The technician that came was very was very punctual. He was extremely knowledgeable of how our pests worked. He was also extremely knowledgeable of how the company worked and very clearly and simple explained all of the options the company offered for our current pest problem and maintaining pest management in the future if we would like to in the future. Will defiantly recommend them to everyone who needs pest management.

reviews.author: Julia Veach
reviews.text: We called Pioneer Pest Management and I had great experience just making my appointment. They're very informative and know what they're doing. A couple days later we had someone come out to our apartment because we've had swarms of ants all over our apartment. (They have been worse than last year.) So we finally decided store bought traps weren't enough to get rid of them. The employee they sent was friendly and explained everything he was doing. He discussed pricing with us and did great job. I haven't seen a single ant since they sprayed and put traps out. They said its takes about 20 days for the ants to take it back to their nest. So far I've seen no ants. Their service also comes with warranty. I'm so impressed.  Thank you.

reviews.author: Maia L
reviews.text: Tyler was amazing! He was very nice and to the point. Will be using Pioneer as my regular pest company.

reviews.author: stacey o'connell
reviews.text: Zack was great! Explained everything thoroughly and was just a pleasure to have help us!

reviews.author: Jackson Graham
reviews.text: Fabulous service and very professional. The technician was very thorough, answered all my questions, and fixed our mice problem so quickly! Gave me peace of mind after a stressful week of trying to do it on our own first. Wish I’d called them sooner!!

reviews.author: Robin Stuart
reviews.text: Ryan is the most awesome bird whisperer! He convinced the pesky bird family to relocate from our attic ducting and put up bird guards so they can't move back in! He was fast, knowledgeable and super friendly! I highly recommend him and Pioneer Pest services for any of your bird wrangling needs! Thanks Ryan and Pioneer Pest Services😊We wil use you in the future if the need ever arises!

reviews.author: Carole Collett-Wheeler
reviews.text: I called Pioneer Pest Management when I realized the  tiny ants I was seeing periodically- and I thought had dealt with we’re back again. My neighbor had used Pioneer and highly recommended them. When Eric and Zack came out , I was sure there wouldn’t be an ant in sight. I couldn’t have been more wrong! Eric and Zack had a flashlight and revealed an unbelievable number of ants heading towards the cat food and in the cat food. Long story short, they quickly analyzed where the ants were living and took care of my house. They took the time to explain what they were doing and what to expect going forward. They answered all my questions- I had a lot- and couldn’t have been nicer or more professional. I highly recommend Eric and Zack to anyone who has unwanted pests. They’re so great!

reviews.author: Yelena Demyanyuk
reviews.text: Called for pest control insection which was promptly scheduled at my convenience. Polite staff arrived on time, they wore  shoe covers everytime they had to go inside. Did very through inspection and the initial treatment.  Thus far I am very pleased with the quality of customer service and I could not wait to see the result of the treatment for significant ant infestation.

reviews.author: Nicole Russell
reviews.text: Very pleased with Pioneer Pest Management. I appreciate that our technician wasn’t a pushy salesman. He was very prompt, courteous, and knowledgeable.

reviews.author: Danielle Michaud
reviews.text: We are very happy to be partnering with Pioneer Pest Management for monitoring ants and other pests around our home. Our first visit in the fall was with Clint, who was extremely outgoing and friendly, as well as knowledgeable. Our second service more recently was with Tyler, who was also great to work with. He took the extra time to hop on a ladder and check out our external vent filters to ensure that we didn't have birds getting into our attic when I mentioned it might be a concern. Both services were on time (if not early!) and it's been really nice to work with people who have such fun personalities.

reviews.author: Geremy Popp
reviews.text: Pioneer has exceptional customer service. Brandon the tech was hands down the best at what he does and how he treats customers. I would highly recommend Pioneer and Brandon.

reviews.text: I've used Pioneer Pest throughout the years and again recently. Tech Ryan was outstanding.  I highly recommend this company.

I had a mouse problem that hit hard and fast and it was horrible to deal with, I’m glad that Pioneer Pest Management was so good to respond quickly and effectively. I also really appreciate that they had email communication too as I work late and can’t always call during the day.

reviews.author: Brett Sivits

reviews.text: These guys do a great job getting rid of those pesky aunts we used to just live with. Especially like Tyler, who is friendly and efficient. Thanks so much!

reviews.text: When we found out we had rats in and around our house we were extremely concerned and called Pioneer. Tyler came out and inspected and went over his findings and what our options were. I had concerns about using the bait boxes and he was very patient and helped me understand so that I was comfortable with our plan and it seems to have worked well. After the first few days we saw no more activity though we left the boxes for longer just to be sure. Tyler was equally as patient and professional on the follow up visits and if we ever have any problems in the future he would certainly be our first call. My husband and I wholeheartedly recommend Pioneer and Tyler.

reviews.author: Robyn Klopman
reviews.text: Ryan was the tech that came out to the house.  He was very professional and explained everything.  I would definitely recommend Pioneer Pest Management to friends and family.

Kay felt bad for me and said she'll  try to see what she could do. She calls back and says they can be there the next day. Ryan comes and does a wonderful job checking out  my place. I live out in the country and have pets, and I was very concerned about poisoning my own pets, as well as local wildlife. He had printed info on their bait, and how it could rarely affect non-targeted animals that may eat the poisoned ones. I felt reassured and confident in how they can help! Thank you!!!

Thanks Pioneer, but no thanks. Your ant service SUCKS and as long as they are charging $150 for 5 minutes of work with 3 difficult full ant treatments and the ants are worse now than before!  Tim came to my home right on schedule, very nice and was clear about what issues I have and what needs to be done.  I appreciate the fact that he didn't suggest treatments for my home that weren't necessary.  Tim was incredibly professional and helped me to understand what was going on in the home I appreciated his professionalism more than anything, I also felt comfortable with him being in my home in spite of the negative issue of having a pest problem. I would highly recommend Tim in the future.

Not knowing what to do I grabbed the shop vac and and started vacuuming up the ants. I got most of them and in the end we had about 2 1/2 gallons of ants. We had Pioneer come out the next day and they sprayed the garage and the complete perimeter of the house. We have pioneer spay twice and year spring and fall and we are ant free. They are easy to work with and very prompt. We would not use anyone else   Dave Smith

reviews.author: toms48
reviews.text: After getting stung by yellow jackets, I called Pioneer Pest Mgmt to remove their nest.  The lady who answered the phone was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. She scheduled a technician for the same day. Daniel (the tech) spent a full hour removing a very large nest (size of a beach ball) in our junipers.  Problem solved on the same day I called!  After discussing the racoon footprints in our crawl space, Daniel mentioned that they could install special screens (that are racoon proof) from the inside our crawl space to keep all large and small critters out.  We had Daniel come back and install the screens.  Now, we don't have to worry about critters getting in our crawl space.  Overall, we have been highly impressed with the quality of the work completed by Daniel and would definitely recommend Pioneer for any pest problems!

reviews.author: Carole Collett-Wheeler
reviews.text: I called Pioneer Pest Management when I realized the  tiny ants I was seeing periodically- and I thought had dealt with we’re back again. My neighbor had used Pioneer and highly recommended them. When Eric and Zack came out , I was sure there wouldn’t be an ant in sight. I couldn’t have been more wrong! Eric and Zack had a flashlight and revealed an unbelievable number of ants heading towards the cat food and in the cat food. Long story short, they quickly analyzed where the ants were living and took care of my house. They took the time to explain what they were doing and what to expect going forward. They answered all my questions- I had a lot- and couldn’t have been nicer or more professional. I highly recommend Eric and Zack to anyone who has unwanted pests. They’re so great!

reviews.author: Yelena Demyanyuk
reviews.text: Called for pest control insection which was promptly scheduled at my convenience. Polite staff arrived on time, they wore  shoe covers everytime they had to go inside. Did very through inspection and the initial treatment.  Thus far I am very pleased with the quality of customer service and I could not wait to see the result of the treatment for significant ant infestation.

reviews.author: Nicole Russell
reviews.text: Very pleased with Pioneer Pest Management. I appreciate that our technician wasn’t a pushy salesman. He was very prompt, courteous, and knowledgeable.

reviews.text: We are very happy to be partnering with Pioneer Pest Management for monitoring ants and other pests around our home. Our first visit in the fall was with Clint, who was extremely outgoing and friendly, as well as knowledgeable. Our second service more recently was with Tyler, who was also great to work with. He took the extra time to hop on a ladder and check out our external vent filters to ensure that we didn't have birds getting into our attic when I mentioned it might be a concern. Both services were on time (if not early!) and it's been really nice to work with people who have such fun personalities.

After the first few days we saw no more activity though we left the boxes for longer just to be sure. Tyler was equally as patient and professional on the follow up visits and if we ever have any problems in the future he would certainly be our first call. My husband and I wholeheartedly recommend Pioneer and Tyler.

reviews.text: I had a dead animal, (I  thought), under my manufactured home. I made an appointment with them. I can't  remember who I  talked with, she said, (again, I  thought)  next Thursday. Well, Thursday  comes around and I call Pioneer and wonderful Kay answered. I told her that I  was wondering  about what time they be at my place. She told me that I wasn't scheduled till May 2nd which would be another week. I said I was staying at a hotel for the last 3 nights because of the smell. Kay felt bad for me and said she'll  try to see what she could do. She calls back and says they can be there the next day. Ryan comes and does a wonderful job checking out  my place. He was very nice and professional. Sorry I rambled on  but I wanted to show how Pioneer went far and above than most businesses. God bless Pioneer.

reviews.text: Tyler came out and gave his professional opinion of our pest problem, that we were unable to get under control on our own. I live out in the country and have pets, and I was very concerned about poisoning my own pets, as well as local wildlife. He had printed info on their bait, and how it could rarely affect non-targeted animals that may eat the poisoned ones. I felt reassured and confident in how they can help! Thank you!!!

reviews.text: Edit:  3-25-19:  I do not recommend this location or place for pest management because they sent a teenager to deal with an ant infestation that was not delt with through 2 previous treatments the problem never went away and now I am being unilaterally charged $150 for a 5-minute ant treatment at my home and the teenager that was here reported to my management company that I had a dog which I don't have and that I was the cause of the problem because I have ants. Thanks Pioneer, but no thanks. Your ant service SUCKS and as long as they are charging $150 for 5 minutes of work with 3 difficult full ant treatments and the ants are worse now than before!  Tim came to my home right on schedule, very nice and was clear about what issues I have and what needs to be done.  I appreciate the fact that he didn't suggest treatments for my home that weren't necessary.  Tim was incredibly professional and helped me to understand what was going on in the home I appreciated his professionalism more than anything, I also felt comfortable with him being in my home in spite of the negative issue of having a pest problem. I would highly recommend Tim in the future.

reviews.text: We have been using Pioneer pest for about 4 years. It all started after we had some trees take out along the house. The tree service noted that there were a lot on ants on one of the trees. I didn't think too much about it until the next morning when I went into the garage and found two walls covered with ants. Not knowing what to do I grabbed the shop vac and and started vacuuming up the ants. I got most of them and in the end we had about 2 1/2 gallons of ants. We had Pioneer come out the next day and they sprayed the garage and the complete perimeter of the house. We have pioneer spay twice and year spring and fall and we are ant free. They are easy to work with and very prompt. We would not use anyone else   Dave Smith

reviews.author: toms48
reviews.text: After getting stung by yellow jackets, I called Pioneer Pest Mgmt to remove their nest.  The lady who answered the phone was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. She scheduled a technician for the same day. Daniel (the tech) spent a full hour removing a very large nest (size of a beach ball) in our junipers.  Problem solved on the same day I called!  After discussing the racoon footprints in our crawl space, Daniel mentioned that they could install special screens (that are racoon proof) from the inside our crawl space to keep all large and small critters out.  We had Daniel come back and install the screens.  Now, we don't have to worry about critters getting in our crawl space.  Overall, we have been highly impressed with the quality of the work completed by Daniel and would definitely recommend Pioneer for any pest problems!

RJ took that extra step in ensuring my home was pest-free. Thank you RJ and thank you Pioneer for maintaining such a quality representative as RJ.

He was courteous and friendly throughout the appointment and explained what he would be doing. I’m allergic to bees so I was very relieved to have someone take care of this for me. I’m looking forward to planting flowers and mowing the yard now. Thank you Pioneer and thank you Ryan! I appreciate your service. If you want GREAT customer service and you need help with insects or other pests, call Pioneer! I highly recommend their company and Ryan!

Thank you Pioneer Pest Management, we will definitely call you guys again if we have any more pest issues.

reviews.text: Tyler was awesome. He was a cool guy and very thorough. I've used Pioneer at two properties so far and their customer service is superb.

reviews.author: Han Le
reviews.text: We noticed there were quite a bit of wasps around the house and saw some large nests high up on the eaves and decided that we need them taken care of to minimize the risk of damage to the siding and the house in general.   I called another company and they said they don’t do 2 story homes and recommended we call Pioneer Pest Management. I’m glad I did because the person who came out to treat the wasps, Carl, was very professional and honest. I appreciate that he wasn’t trying to sell me anything that wasn’t necessary and was completely honest when I asked him questions about the treatment and how I should go about it.   Carl was able to take care of the nests quickly and thoroughly. He was informative and was truly here to help us with the problem and not just perform a service.  We recommend Pioneer Pest Management to anyone that is looking for professional and honest pest control service.   It was mentioned that it will take about 3 weeks for the service to be in full effect so I will update this in a month or so if things change, but I’m almost certain it will not.

reviews.author: Kristina Elseth
reviews.text: Pioneer had been recommended to me by a friend who had also uses them and was very happy with the results.  She was not wrong! They were able to give me a next day appointment and time that I could expect them.  The gentleman who arrived at our hone was very courteous and helpful.  They guarantee their work! Their prices are extremely reasonable.  I have only good things to say about Piineer!

reviews.text: Clinton was friendly, knowledgeable, and efficient! Thanks!
